channel.title: Tyrel Hiebert
channel.description: Tyrel Hiebert is a software engineer constantly learning new skills and technologies.

item.title: Dark Mode React Toggle
item.description: I developed a dark and light theme for this site and built a toggle to switch between them. Also I used media queries to set the default theme to match the visitors operating system choice.
